description: Query a knowledge base collection using semantic search
explanation: This plugin searches a knowledge base collection using semantic similarity to find the most relevant content. It uses vector embeddings to understand the meaning of the query and return conceptually related information, even if the exact words don't match.

inputDefinitions.name: queryText
inputDefinitions.description: The search query text to find relevant content

inputDefinitions.name: domains
inputDefinitions.description: Array of knowledge domain/collection names to search in (e.g., ['ai_development', 'research_findings'])

inputDefinitions.name: maxResults
inputDefinitions.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)

outputDefinitions.name: results
outputDefinitions.description: Array of search results with content, metadata, and relevance scores

outputDefinitions.name: summary
outputDefinitions.description: Summary information about the search including query, domains searched, and result count

inputGuidance: Use 'queryText' for the search query and 'domains' as an array of collection names to search
